description:
My place is close to All public transportation everything is close by! The Best of the Worlds International Eatery's Just hop,skip and a jump away !!!

Its one of kind layout is eye popping!!Just take a look !! Its ViBeS are out of this Worrldd!!

You have access to everything!

As often or as little as you like

Well your situated and rated to be most upscale part of Brooklyn.. We have our amazing canal with yachts and boats you can rent ,go fishing ,jet skiing or take a trip around the Statue of Liberty!! 3 beaches not 1 or 2 but 3, hands down the best of best of all sorts of international Eatery's, Lounges and Kitchens !!!

Welcomee!!

All public transportation is literally right outside your place !!
name: The Brooklyn Lux !! Best Deal !!
review: I really enjoyed my stay here . The living room was my favorite part ! Oh and the bedroom. Great Sushi nearby. Will definitely book again !
